{"blocks":[{"key":"2v8j8","text":"Wash the column with   of base buffer, followed by   of wash buffer twice. Allow wash buffer to pass through completely between washes. {"blocks":[{"key":"abls","text":"Pool the elutions and desalt using a HiPrep 26/10 deasalting column, run on an AKTA pure at a maximum flow rate of 10mL/min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69tnu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9mte0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"fkd3u","text":"Desalting reduces the concentration of imidazole in the sample which may inhibit TEV protease activity during tag cleavage as well as interfering with the reverse IMAC step. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2og1","text":"For tag removal, His-TEV was added in 1:20 ratio to the total protein content of the diluted sample, as determined by nanodrop. The mixture was left standing in the cold room at     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":178,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":180,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7qqv5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f8f8r","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fl0li","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"14kbd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"7CADD574F04211EEA0C70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"7CADD4CAF04211EEA0C70A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1otk5","text":"TEV:total protein ratio increased due to previous difficulty with tag cleavage for this construct. TEV addition at the standard 1:100 ratio left the majority of His-tagged CVNSP3mac1 uncleaved after overnight cold incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2aaai","text":"In morning, pour the cleavage mixture over the washed resin three times and collect final FT.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2671h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dpgga","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fskh7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4dqtk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ivgl","text":"This step will remove the cleaved tag and any uncleaved target from the sample. If the protease used is His-tagged, then the protease is removed from sample too. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c8956","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2hjk1","text":"Previous purification where the cleavage mixture was incubated with the rIMAC resin while rotating  for 30mins in cold resulted in protein precipitation. No such issue observed when passing mixture through resin three times.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdc5a","text":"Wash used IMAC resin with 10 CV of base buffer, and leave in the column submerged in a small amount of base buffer such that the resin is kept moist.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1hnpu","text":"This washed IMAC resin will later be reused for reverse IMAC (rIMAC)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3picu","text":"(Optional) elute rIMAC resin with   elution buffer to confirm if the protein shows non-specific binding to the resin used.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"40cbj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"tpu9","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3a92e","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"062E8DB6FE5211EE93260A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":3254}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"r8or","text":"This will help determine if the protein is \"sticky\" to the Ni resin matrix material, and help in further troubleshooting if the final yield is lower than expected.
